settings.not_found_text:
We're sorry, but the page you requested could not be found.

Try searching or continue shopping.

settings.title: Bringing plants & people together
settings.subtitle: Plants make people happy. It's that simple.

settings.title: We're purveyors of a green lifestyle
Let's grow together
settings.text: We're creating an environmentally-conscious community of plant lovers, ecology experts and horticultural specialist. Gathering to thrive and uplift each other while pursuing our plant passions.  Interested? Everyone's welcome.

settings.title: How often do you get new plants in?
settings.answer: We make regular plant orders once a week, with orders from specialty suppliers coming in twice a month. Feel free to reach out to us if you're looking for a specific plant variety.

settings.title: My plant doesn't look the same as the photo – how come?
settings.answer: It is the nature of handmade ceramics and living plants to have some variations in color, size and finish. Because each plant and pot is unique, you may notice subtle differences with your potted plant and the picture online.

settings.title: My terrarium died, can you help?
settings.answer: Don't worry, it happens to the bet of us! Contact us for a refresh or follow our DIY instructions here.

settings.title: How can I check my order status?
settings.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email notification that contains a tracking number. You can track your order by looking up the tracking number on the delivery company's website.

settings.title: What's your return policy?
settings.answer: Due to the nature of the product, we handle plant return requests on a case-by-case basis. We accept returns for plant accessories & lifestyle products.

settings.title: Where do you ship?
settings.answer: We currently ship to Canada and the United States.

settings.title: Heading
settings.text: Text area can be used for details about blog authors or general information.
We'd love to hear from you! Fill out our contact form to get in touch with our team.

settings.label: Subscribe to our newsletter to get the dirt on new products & more.

settings.title: Looking to get in touch?
settings.content_text: Our team is here to help answer any questions you may have about our products, plant care & more! We'll get back to you as soon as we can. Please keep in mind that we're in office hours from 9am - 5pm EST, Monday - Friday.

settings.richtext: Looking to start a plant family? Check out our book selection to discover everything you need to know!
